statements: DELETE FROM feedback_analysis WHERE satisfaction_score < 3 AND customer_id = 100;
DELETE FROM feedback_analysis WHERE customer_id = 200 AND satisfaction_score BETWEEN 4 AND 5;
DELETE FROM feedback_data WHERE customer_id = 100 AND satisfaction_score < 3;
DELETE FROM customer_info WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe' AND email_address = 'john.doe@example.com';
DELETE FROM customers_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%poor%' AND satisfaction_score < 3;
DELETE FROM SatisfactionScores WHERE satisfaction_score < 3 OR survey_date < '2022-01-01';
